ygData.subject: new scenarios

I have decided that I will put a disclaimer on my scenarios saying 
that going through any other scenarios is not just advised, it will
be 
almost be necessary in order to win.  Translation: my test team will 
go through the tevfifty completely before visiting my own scenarios.

By the way, IMHO, ghosts make better NPCs than faeries, because it is 
easier to kill a ghost than a faerie.

As far as a potential tournament goes, I would not mind cheating on 
money as long as the money cheaters did not compete against the 
legitimate teams.  Money cheaters would be subject to a different set 
of rules than legitimate teams.
